title: Can you use 2 wired controllers on a Nintendo Switch? - Quora

response.answer_text: I assume you mean via USB, yes you can, three even if each controller needs a USB port. Theoretically more of you plug in a USB controller adapter with multiple ports, such as the GameCube controller adapter.
You can use 3 on a Nintendo Switch dock, and with a USB multiplier you can connect more (but you can only play with 4 controllers at a time)
